articles.title: In Southeast Asia, robust immunity found up to 9 months after SARS-CoV-2 infection - News-Medical.Net
articles.description: Now, a new study posted to the bioRxiv* preprint server focuses on functional immune memory to SARS-CoV-2, up to nine months in a Southeast Asian cohort, in the absence of re-infection.
